dict.acceptation: 块；街区；<英>大楼，大厦；障碍物，阻碍；

sent.orig: Smith says he's also looking into building a BLOCK terrain park and snowboarding school there.
sent.trans: 史密斯说他现在在考虑建立BLOCK的地面公园和滑雪学校。

sent.orig: Margins of inline-block elements do not collapse (not even with their in-flow children).
sent.trans: 设置了inline-block元素的垂直margin不会被折叠（甚至与他们的子元素间也是一样）。

sent.orig: The block can either be a fixed block or a moving block.
sent.trans: 该方式将线路分成多个区段，通常一个区段上不能多于一辆列车。

sent.orig: Production of automobile disk-type block, shoe block, facing and motorbike brake block.
sent.trans: 生产各类高品质的汽车盘式片、鼓式片、蹄块、衬片、摩托车刹车片。

sent.orig: These sub-block sets are denoted by capital letters following the block number (Block 15S, for example).
sent.trans: 这些子批号集用紧跟在批号数字之后的大写字母表示（比如说，第15S批）。
